Functions

int HAL_OpenPwm (HAL_PwmUnit_t pwmUnit)
 Initializes the PWM.
int HAL_StartPwm (HAL_PwmDescriptor_t *descriptor)
 Starts PWM on specified channel.
int HAL_StopPwm (HAL_PwmDescriptor_t *descriptor)
 Stops PWM on specified channel.
int HAL_SetPwmFrequency (HAL_PwmUnit_t pwmUnit, uint16_t top, HAL_PwmPrescaler_t prescaler)
 Sets base frequency of module. Common for all module channels.
int HAL_SetPwmCompareValue (HAL_PwmDescriptor_t *descriptor, uint16_t cmpValue)
 Sets compare value for the PWM channel.
int HAL_ClosePwm (HAL_PwmUnit_t pwmUnit)
 Closes the PWM.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum HAL_PwmPolarity_t

PWM impulse polarity.

Enumerator:
PWM_POLARITY_NON_INVERTED 

PWM output is low when duty cycle = 0%.

PWM_POLARITY_INVERTED 

PWM output is high when duty cycle = 0%.

Definition at line 166 of file pwm.h.
